subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Donald Fehr, the executive director of the N.H.L. players association, said of a provocative hire by the union, “Your objective is to find the strongest and the best functioning staff that you can.”
snippet: Donald Fehr, the executive director of the N.H.L. players association, said of a provocative hire by the union, “Your objective is to find the strongest and the best functioning staff that you can.”
